name: The Cake isnt a Lie
description:
a Game made with LÖVE 11.3 for the UGJ#23. Happy birthday :).

a Turn-based puzzle where you control a player and try to solve multiple puzzle to reach the Cake in each level.

Controls :

  • Arrow Keys - Move
  • R - restart

 Credits :

  • Kirito

Install :

  • Extract then execute "play.bat" for Windows users or "make.sh" for Linux users

- You Can find the Project Source Code and Other Jam Projects in our Github Repo.

Here's your cake
